content.detailedDescription:
1 in my living room in my apartment on the third floor
2 i was watching tv
3 i usually look over my balcony for the moon in the evening
4 see above
5 ohmygod ohmygod ohmygod
6 after contacting everyone i could think of and watching for over 1 hour i was freezing and was forced to come off the balcony i did not see the craft depart
ps i tried to take pictures with my cell phone and digital camera but it was too dark i also called and left a voicemail at the exact time of the sighting
content.summary: Craft houverd and maneuvered tilted and lights flashed appeared and disappeared numbering 1 to 10 crafts observed for over 1 hour

content.detailedDescription:
I noticed it over my sisters house at first, a commercial jet flew under it. jets normally fly at or above the 30,000 foot level. it is blue and flashes on and off.
i pointed it out to my wife at first, she was stumped by what it was. i have a private pilots license and a retired engineer. 
it is only seen at night, every single day still. it varies a few degrees up or down within a fixed location.
it appears to move, but in reality, it is the planet rotating. it goes from east to west every night and can be seen in clear weather.
because of the flashing effect,it is difficult to gauge it size or distance.
i check it every night and it is a constant thus far.
it is not incoming due to the fact,it does not change size or brightness.
i have a cheap telescope, with weak optics and could not pin it down. if i had a celestron, it would be a snap.
personally, i haven't the foggiest idea of what it is. my wife,daughter and son in law witnessed it. as a matter of fact you can watch it yourself anytime, so far. i will call it "old faithful".
i live in a rural area and my house is located on treeless grounds. 
the best vantage point is on my deck.
content.summary: Blue-white flashing light., stars do not flash on and off.

content.detailedDescription:
I should have reported this when it happened but had to get my head around it. around july 16, 2013, i was laying back in my pool looking at the stars and watching meteors around 12:30am. i do this a lot as i am an amateur astronomer. i saw a streak of light enter the atmosphere from the east and thought that it would be an awesome meteor display as huge as it was. it left a huge long trail as it slowed to a crawl. please forgive the following description but it is the only thing i can think of to describe it, it looked like a ship dropping out of "warp" if you watch the syfy channel. the craft slowed a lot then maintained a level flight path, to the point our aircraft would fall from the sky. it traveled in a easterly direction for a ways then turned to the south west where it continued to travel for a minute or so. it then started to gain altitude and climb until i could no longer see it. the craft looked all white, like it had a glow to it or something but still looked obviously solid, and was a crescent shape. it made no noise that i could hear and didn't leave any trail after initially entering the atmosphere and slowing. the whole sighting lasted about 3 minutes, maybe 4. i've tried to debunk it myself but there aren't any objects that i am aware of that can travel like that and meteors don't deliberately change direction then rise in altitude. i spend a lot of time looking through a celestron c8 telescope so i know exactly what all the planets and moon look like. i was pretty shocked, but i personally feel this object was not ours. of all the times to not have my telescope out with my camera attached, :-/
i was hoping to make a cgi representation of the object and path but i don't know how to do it.
content.summary: Whitnessed a craft enter atmosphere, eventually slowed down, changed direction after a while then ascended

content.detailedDescription: It was about 930 at night i went outside to smoke a cigarette and immediately saw a bunch of lights in the sky looking west towards down town del rio. i immediately ran back inside to get one of my roommates. i was very excited. i said, hey man hurry up come out side and check this out. i ran back inside to get my telescope hoping to get a better view.All i could see was a red dot by the time i got one of them in focus it started to fade away there wasn't enough time to find another one i noticed they were all starting disappear. i didn't see how they appeared,where they came from or if were moving or not. the whole sighting only lasted about 3 or 4 minutes there were approximately 6 or 7 of them and seemed to be spread out and at various hights. it occurred to me that it may be a publicity stunt for the upcoming ufo festival and that the may very well have been flares. thinking that someone else would report it i only posted on the festival site and waited to see if anything was mentioned by someone else. i am hoping that this report will bring about other responses or reports.
content.summary: Went out to smoke a cigarette and saw a bunch of lights over down town

content.detailedDescription:
Thick triangler shape whiteblue white and red lights moving very bright dome on bottom  red lights blinking with white lights on corners
someone had some money to build this!!!
content.summary: Thicktrianglershapewhitewhiteandredlightsmovingverybrightdomeonbottomwithwhitelightlightsoncornors

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Same as above
content.summary: Strange flying object accompanied by odd noise. kept waiting to see a low flying plane and saw object instead. lights seemed to be rotating as i continues to see the same 2 lights as it moved passed the windows

content.detailedDescription: I got in the car and begin driving to the store when i noticed three red lights in the same general area of the sky slowly flying north. they seemed lower and smaller then the planes in the area and were putting out a lot of red light. i was impressed enough to turn around in my car and run inside to get my brother. he and girlfriend came outside and i showed them the lights and they were impressed as well. we watched the three red lights for a couple of minutes and around the point that they were over our head my brother's girlfriend noticed three or four more red lights coming from and traveling in the same direction the original lights were seen. my brother went inside and told my mother and her husband and they came outside and watched the lights. in all around ten red lights slowly flew past us over the course of five minutes so. the distance between the first light seen and the last would have been several miles. all the lights but one disappeared north into horizon but the last one slowly climbed in altitude as it moved north and was eventually lost in the clouds above before it had a chance to fly over like all the other lights did. i video taped the lights with my cell phone but there is no trees or buildings in the background for reference, just black sky so you can't make out the movement of the lights. th event it's self was exciting and fun but once they were gone everyone just smiled at each other, shrugged our shoulders at our lack of answers for what the lights were, and continued on with our night and left again for the store. i'm writing in on the chance that there were more witnesses then me and my family.
content.summary: Saw around ten red lights in a rough line fly over head in a northerly direction over the course of five minutes.

content.detailedDescription: I woke up very early that august morning & for some reason i sat up in bed & got up right away,i went straight into the kitchen of my flat in worthing.Looking back i dont know why i got up right away & i didnt even go into the bathroom first as i normally would.I reached for the kettle & went to fill it up at the sink which was right by the window & that was when i saw them,my jaw dropped because right in front of me directly above the rooftops of the houses behind my flat were six craft in two rows of three.They appeared to be extremely low in the sky & only just above the rooftops,i feel that they were very close to me indeed as the houses behind my flat were not very far away from my building.They were oval in shape & white/silvery in colour but what was most striking was the dazzling sparkle of each one,i can only assume that they had a highly polished mirror like finish on whatever they were made of that was sparkling in the bright sunshine.This was a very sunny morning with a virtually cloudless sky,which was unusual because the summer of 2012 was very cloudy & rainy.The two rows of three were seperated diagonally ie one row was above the other but diagonally off to the right & the three craft in each row were so close together that they appeared to be touching eachother.I could hear no sound atall & i plucked up the courage to go out on my balcony to see if there was any noise for sure,i could hear nothing & they were completely motionless just kind of hanging there.I didnt stay out on the balcony for long(i was living on the second floor)i came back in because i felt really uneasy/scared of what i was seeing.I first noticed the craft at 4.55am & i stood watching them for about fourty minutes until 5.35am i felt that i couldnt take my eyes off of them & i could not believe that this was really happening but it was i was wide awake & i even pinched myself several times to make sure that i was awake.I really wished that i had taken photos or woken my sons up to show them but i felt kind of rooted to the spot & i was also afraid that if i went away they might disappear.At 5.35am it suddenly occurred to me that they might be watching me,infact i became convinced of it & i felt suddenly very afraid & decided to go back to bed.This is something that i now really regret because i didnt see them go or anything...When i got up again at about 7.30am they were gone & have no idea now how long they stayed there or how they moved off etc,this i will always regret but i had become overcome with fear in the end & felt convinced that i was being watched.I did not report this incident at the time but i told my daughter & her husband about it also my two other younger sons,i think it rather scared them all.I have wondered & worried about this incident a lot since it happened & have now decided to inform you of it....I know that this did happen,i did see what i saw & i cant explain it.I know a fair bit about aircraft as i was born into a family of aviation enthusiasts & many people on my dads side of the family were in past & are now employed in aviation with de havillands at hatfield & lockheed in the usa as well as the rae at farnborough etc.My dad had been in the raf & was very interested in aeroplanes...I was taken to aerodromes & air displays from a very young age & i know a fair bit about airplane design & aviation & so i feel certain that what i saw were not man made craft,they wouldnt be considered aerodynamic i dont think.I cant believe that no one else in worthing saw what i saw that morning even though it was very early,i just want to know what i saw & what or who it was & what do they want?I feel sure that i was drawn to my kitchen window that morning,thats how it felt to me then & it still does...Looking back i was drawn to the kitchen window & i have a strange feeling that i was meant to see what i saw that morning & that bothers me very much.
content.summary: I saw the six craft in two rows of three from my kitchen window,the rows of three were touching eachother it appeared to me & one row was diagonally above the other

content.detailedDescription: At8:30 on the evening of jan 22, 2014i was walking back from the mailbox.  i looked up at the stars and planets the way i usually like to do.As i noticed 3 bright what i thought were stars almost directly overhead, i stopped momentarily to look at them only to see that these stars were moving.At that point i noticed other star-like lights all moving to the northwest. at first i thought them to be satellites, but figured they could not be as they were flying much too close to each other.Upon looking around i also noticed in the south direction 3 lights lined up in a 45 degree angle all evenly spaced flying as if in unison, with other lights around them flying in the same direction. after a couple of minutes i got my wife to come and look at this to prove i was not seeing things. shecame out in time to confirm what i had seen and she had no explanation of what it was we saw. i watched this event for 5 min, so i do not know how many others there might have been, but for me it was an awesome experience as i truly believe we are not and have not been alone in this universe for a long, long time
content.summary: Saw over 2 dozen star-like objects within 5 min with about 3or 4 that had a faint gl

content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription: As i was saying : that you guys have made an investigator!!! yes, mr a epling is a fine man i enjoyed his company! and i love his photos! but he has lied to me several times! he gavee a couple of photos, that i put up on my wall , just to have someone slip into my home while i was asleep and steal both of them??? to me this is remarkable! i keep my doors locked and have two dogs? but , i have called him on his home phone that he gave me the number to and i reported things, and all i was told was that if they ever fly towards the east, which is in the direction of his home to make sure to call so he could try to look up off his porch or deck and photograph! i am not in any definition crazy! this has been very insulting to me! i have had an encounter that i have no answers for, and still they keep on flying around like its a ufo meeting place! i have quit writing times and dates and details down! i am just writing to let you people know that i am done with you!!! to see you guys being portrayed on tv as a help to the average joe or jane makes me ill ! watching your so called " investigators" bring out equipment to test an analyze is for tv and that's it! you guys have had my number for well over a year! he'll these things follow me? or they're everywhere and nobody is looking up! i had a family photo made at myrte beach and the guy that we hired to take the photos stopped in his tracks and looked up and over us and said i swear i just saw something in the sky! well yes he did , because he looks on his camera and in two photos there's a light out over the ocean ! so i purchased them at the place where they were developed and now i have those two pics also plus all of my photos and one film! i keep guns everywhere! i keep one on the side of my mattress now because all of the stuff that's went down! i will find a real group that will put the time needed into this to prove to a lot of people that this isn't man made stuff!! u can believe that!!! while your newbie investigator builds his bunker over in virgie ky for whatever catastrophe he's building it for! no doubt alan has been through something, and i feel for him, but you got to check stuff out when someone tells you! if not do something else! when i met w mr epling he recorded me and asked a lot of the right questions! but, he told me that his boss which was a female would be very happy with the photos and all of the detailed info including my sketches! i still haven't heard a thing from anyone connected to you guys? i know that you are having a problem keeping people working for you in ky, well my response to that is send someone from ohio, tennessee , hell california ! i don't care where someone is from? get it done or quit !!! stop acting like you guys care and or your authority figures when it comes to ufos !!! goodbye! sincerely jm!!!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other
content.shape: Circle,   Cylinder,   Disc,   Oval,   Sphere,   Star-like,   Other,   Unknown
content.summary: Listen, i'm almost sure you guys know what these are!!! i have had numerous sightings! i need help with these things! i gave you guys great daytime pics! i need to talk to a veteran! not an observer that has just taken a good photo that you guys have made

content.detailedDescription:
I was out clearing snow from a storm the previous day.  i moved the snow blower back to the shed and was cleaning it off when looking to the soutwest i saw the object.  it should have not been there....It was very bright and not moving....I could see venus and the moon, watched it for 3-4 minutes.  the sun was coming up and no stars were visible because of the light from the sunrise.  as i watched it......It blinked out......As if a light had been switched off.
i am an amateur astronomer and have lived near an airbase all my life. i have seen seven decades and this is the second time i have see a ufo do the exact same thing at the same time of year ?
it was not an aircraft, there was no sound.
content.summary: Star like, 4-5 times brightness of venus to southeast - only moon brighter to west.
content.locationName: Happy Valley-Goose Bay, Newfoundland and Lab

content.detailedDescription: I was at my brothers house, helping my sister-in-law at the garage, when suddently i felt anxious, trumbled, and desperate, felt like someone was calling me, wasnt feeling my self for that moment, walked to the from of tha house and looked up  and saw this red-orange constantly changing plane! it was very low at least 20 feet from a house roof! i called my sister-in-law and asked her, can u see that? she said yeah what is it? i dont no where i got this but i told her weved got visitors! so she took her iphone and enlarge the camera and we both stood there paniqued for like a second or two then looked each other and said thats an ufo! it was shaped like a plate with a ball or round glass on top, at the middle were lights running on and off frequently! they were orange-red! so it keept moving very slowly, by that that time it was like if time slowed down atlwast for me! then when the plate got to a certain distance it flew fast and dissapeared! then i said to myself i want pictures, please come again!  when we were walking again to the house, less then 2 seconds, it appeard again, thats when i went running to get my camera, took pictures and videos! my sister in law took some pictures but they all came out black! only on my pictures u can see the grey plate with something round shaped on top! everyday after that ived been having dreams and visions of them coming to get me! everynight that is! plus where i now live i see them passing by! and i try to show them to other people near me, and when they turn to see, they just go faster en dissapear in the sky.. or into another dimession...
content.summary: Felt some one was calling me, walked to front saw them! said to myself pass again! they did! been having dreams everyday since then!

content.detailedDescription: I saw a big hovering jet like thing that looked like something from the terminator films,i was driving home on the freeway and i saw this weird looking craft flying low i didnt think much of it because the john wayne airport is in the city which i assumed it was going to and it was flying really fast and then stopped just as quick over some office building and slowly lowered. it was triangular yet round, no visible windows no exhaust emission barely any lights but it was multicolored and dark and reflective.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I saw a big hovering jet like thing

content.detailedDescription: Several ufos from 2011, need help with pics
content.summary: Unidentified flying objects

content.detailedDescription: As i was driving home to canyon lake from a job interview in new braunfels on fm 2722 on january 3, 2014 around 11:00 a.M., i saw a bullet like shaped object floating in the sky.  it was a little less than a mile away from the road to the northwest.  i noticed it did not have wings, so i pulled over on the side of the road, turned off my radio and began taking pictures. there was no noise, or delayed noises coming from the object.  i knew immediately it was not an airplane or helicopter.  this was an object i had never seen before.  at first siting the object, it seemed to be floating and moving south and had an orange-red glow on the front half and a grey metallic color on the back part of the object.  i was in awe and knew i had to get a picture.  after the first picture was taken, i checked to make sure the picture turned out and then went to take a second photo, but the object was gone.  i started to drive off and then i saw the object far away within seconds.  i took another picture.  after checking the picture to make sure it turned out, i looked back at the sky where the object was, and it was gone and i did not see the object in the sky again.
content.summary: A bullet like object with a red and orange glow on half of the object and grey on the other half.

content.detailedDescription:
me and a friend of mine were in the woods on the south side of binghamton, ny. we were on a walking trail just off of a main road. the area is fairly populated.  we were just hiking at night for something to do. well, on the way back to the car when we reached a spot in the trail that always had given me the creeps for no particular reason.  (maybe 75 yards from where the car was parked) 
we had both stopped in this spot. so being the jokester i am, i turned off the flashlight for maybe 1 minute at most, it was probably closer to 30-40 seconds. well when i turned around to look behind me, i was encountered by a tall green glowing human like figure. and it was right there in my face. it could not have been standing any more that 6 inches away from me.  i was staring nose to nose with this thing.  i could not distinguish any facial features.  but it had the outline of a human, i could see legs arms and a head. it was glowing so bright it looked like just the outline of a person. no sound no movement just standing there over my shoulder.  my friend who was standing right next to me saw the same exact thing. we were not on anything, we had not been drinking. so in pure terror we took off running as fast as we could down the trail to the car. i don't remember ever looking back to see if it was still there. as we were driving away a felt like a burst of energy go through me. my friend did not feel this too.  i was immediately overcome by the worst headache i have ever had. out of pain i put my hand on my head, to feel that my forehead seemed to be protruding , like a golf ball sized bulge.  my friend could see it at first glance, and drove me directly to the hospital. by the time we arrived there 5 minutes after the incident, the bulge in my head was gone and the headache had subsided. so i decided not to go in to the er due to fear of being locked up in a mental institution.

 this occurred in 2002. just a few days ago i ran into my friend after over a decade later.  he told me he was there the following summer, (summer of 2013)and had witnessed the same thing in almost the same location. to this day i have no idea what we saw. but i have never been so scared in my life.
content.summary: Green glowing human figure

content.detailedDescription: Watching a contrail about sunset i noticed a bright star like object close to the trail as the aircraft passed. my first thought was of venus but i realized that wasn't possible and then i noticed another star like object just below the first, probably five degrees. then i saw another lower and to the left of the second. i got excited and called  my friend jerry who lives about a hundred miles east in the reno nevada area to see if he could see anything. he said yes he could then about the same time we saw more i could see seven total but jerry could see only six .Probably because he has mountains to his west. both our wives saw them. i got my little telescope and set it on the highest one and watched as the sky got darker. the object looked round and seemed to have a bright spot on the lower left side. it continually got dimmer and kept moving at a steady rate across my field of view due to the earths rotation. as time went on it got dimmer probably due to increased atmosphere getting between me and it as the earth rotated. i called a friend in hawaii and said to keep an eye out for the phenomenon as the sun started to set. i didn't think to take a picture.
content.summary: Seven star like objects seen in the western sky from western united states

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking a walk at greenlake , i was sitting for a rest at the west beach.I was watching airliners in the pattern for sea-tac and noticed a silvery-white ball high in the sky. i watched it awhile and noticed 2 others approached it. over 45 min they moved around,, circled,, hovered,, went upwind, diagonal to prevailing wind and went downwind. they formed a tight triangle formation,, then were in trail, then were moving individually. i watched them when i could as breaks in the clouds made viewing possible.I started losing sight of them as dusk began to increase.

 i don't know if it is connected, but i have had a bad headache since coming home.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Thru breaks in clouds i saw 3 silvery/white spheres that slowly moved, hovered, changed position, hovered,, etc. i watched them for 45 min.

content.detailedDescription: I walked on to my front porch, which faces east, and saw a flash, about 35degrees the horizon. at first i thought shooting star. only it looked like a green orb, not off in the sky but pretty close to me, and was not moving fast enough to be a meteor(ite). and was basically falling at a constant speed, not unlike a flare or the end of a large firework. only there was no noise and it gave off no smoke or sparks or any sort of trail. it fell straight down, i'm talking perpindicular, no variation or blowing with the wind, and the light it gave off was a constant orb which never variated and didn't appear to illuminate my surroundings. from my vantage i would have to guesstimate the orb of light was about the size one of the big medicine balls. it fell from what i would guess to be about 400 ft high, and appeared to me to be about 4 streets over, so maybe like 800 ft away. it took about 2.5 seconds from when i looked at it to when it would have landed. it fell behind the treeline and at the time it would have landed, there was no crash or flash or anything. i do not know if it was moving around before i went outside (there have been similar sightings in the same neighborhood), but i'm fairly sure what caught my attention was a flash, so it may have actually somehow formed, or what have you, while i could see it. it was unlike anything i've ever seen and i'm a pretty avid stargazer. could have been a drone, but the light it gave off was eerie and not like an led or flare.
content.summary: Green orb flashed, catching my attention, then descended to ground behind treeline.

content.detailedDescription: The same one i reported earlier sry typed the adress wrong
content.summary: Same as the one at 2730

content.detailedDescription: 7 bright lights in a scattered formation, southwest from my backyard.  stayed there for 20 minutes then one by one, disappeared.
content.summary: Solid 7 lights in a formation.

content.detailedDescription:
On my flat balcony. light to bright then saw some others and kept staring. the object appeared a star or airplane. but then kept changing, not moving and was to big for airplane. i checked flight radar and no airplanes in the area at the moment. at least at that height.

started with white light, then 3 red lights showed up, then disappeared, white light appeared again, with random bright blinking. afterwards, some orange trail. and again this 3 events randomly during 10min
content.summary: Started with white light, then 3 red lights showed up, then disappeared, white light appeared again, with random bright blinking. afterwards, some orange trail. and again this 3 events randomly during 10min

content.detailedDescription: In 2010 after leaving my younger sister nancys home in cibolo, texas, i decided i wanted to move to colorado springs where i had met a lady on a dating website that said i could stay at her home while she was out checking on other homes she owned in other states.  we never met, but i did stay at her house for only two weeks when i had booked a room on fort carson army base before an apartment i had applied for would be ready for me to move in.  while walking around fort carson, i was amazed the mountain where norad was and i started to take pictures on the mountain.  later that night, i started feeling loud sounds, movement around me and pressing also around me from all around my body.  no matter where i went on that the base, in my car that i had just purchased, the church where i tried to get help and even the memorial hospital in colorado springs later that same week.  this disturbance was still hanging around me.  when i finally moved into my own apartment, i still had this disturbance around me and was still with me everywhere i went.  i came to the point that every weekend i would have to call 911 because i was losing my breath, feeling pressure around me and shacking nervously.  this occurred for three weeks where every time i had first been taken to the memorial hospital, then the penrose-st. francis hospital & health services and was then put into psychic iatric wards at each of these hospitals.   it was on the third when i called 911, i was sent to the memorial hospital again, and them they sent me to the denver va psychiatric ward before and stayed there for 48 hours before they had to release me.  then i decided to call my younger sister in cibolo, texas to allow me to come back and live with her and her family until i could recover.  at this day, these disturbances are still with me and i had tired, and i mean tried to get it away with no success whatsoever. i really need help with this disturbing situation.
content.summary: Just a humming sound and movement

content.detailedDescription: At home doing the normal night night routine with my 3 kids when i looked out the sliding glass door in the direction of traditions and hwy 95, i saw about 4,5, or 6 lights all lined up on the exact same plane and then in just an instant they were gone. i watched for a little while longer but didn't see them again.
content.summary: 4, 5, 6 red lights in a row and then they blinked out all at once and were gone.

content.detailedDescription: I saw three orange rotating orbs clustered together. the object was hovering over the lake near my house. i saw it was sucking up water, from my knowledge about ufos and a extraterrestrial i knew they were just collecting fuel. i also saw a zeta by the tree line who was watching me. she communicated with me telepathically. she asked me if i was afaid. i thought back " no im not, for i know of others who have seen beings like you". i walked closer  to get a closer look. she began asking me questions about my age gender weight and height, then she asked me about how i came by the knowledge of what she was. i told her how i came by it. then i asked her what race she was ahe said she was a zeta and that he name was altara (all-tar-a). she then said she would keep in touch with me through my mind and said that if i ever wanted any more knowledge to just say her name, she then asked me my name, i told her truthfully seeing that there was no need to lie, and she said that i was very wise and that she trusted me. then she said goodbye to me i then  felt a sharp pain in the back of my neck and passed our i woke up in my bed. i then looked out the window and saw her wave goodbye to me as a blue beam of light shot from the craft and transported her back. then the craft shot off northward. i have conversed with her multiple times and she has contacted me to see what new information about ufos and extraterrestrials i have learned, as well as things about my planet.
content.summary: Contact with witness three orange spinning lights

content.detailedDescription:
Attached is a digital photo of the items. i did not see them, they only showed up in the photo. they must have been instantaneous. this is not a time laps photo. this happened in the instance of taking the picture.
odd.
content.summary: Lights

content.detailedDescription: I was in my room heard a humming out side and went to go investigate i saw try bright orange orbs close together. they were spinning counter clock wise sucking up water. being familiar with ufo phenomena i knew it was getting fuel. i then heard a message from a nearby zeta/grey to not be alarmed, i told him i m not and that i knew of others who had seen her race before. she asked me if i knew what her race was called i guessed and told her that i thought she was a zeta. she nodded. i told her what i knew and she seemed to be surprised about how much i knew and said that she would keep touch with me through my mind. she said that any time i needed to contact her to just say her name. she told me it was altara (al-tar-a). she said she was glad to have met someone so knowledge able of her kind in such a un visited place. i then felt a sharp pain in the back of my neck and then passed out.  i woke up in my bed. and looked out the window to see her wave goodbye and then a beam of light take her into her ship and watch it take off. i have since then talked to her every wensday before i goto bed.
content.summary: Acircular object hovered sucked up water and  took off

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking to the local store,just a normal day.
i was looking at the beautiful sky and noticed what looked like a giant mirror.
i thought at first it was a mylar balloon but it was too large to be that.
it was reflective,very large almost encompassed the entire building,it hovered about 2 minutes,then went up very fast.
i actually didn't believe in ufo's or anything of the sort,but this was something,i don't know what.
i was curious,i was not afraid there was a feeling of calmness,almost like i met an old friend again.
i lost sight of the object when it just jetted straight up very fast.
content.summary: Holy crap!!!!!

content.detailedDescription: Coming back from a friend's house on xmas night. making a right turn from highway 36 onto middle rd. in hazlet, n.J. after i made a turn me and my wife saw 3 red objects round in shape moving slowly east about 100 feet above the houses on the right hand side of middle rd. i stop at the first house next to airport plaza shopping center. pull out my cell phone to video the object. when i started to video the object it was over me and started moving straight up. there was no sounds coming from the object. i kept taping it till i couldn't see it any more.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 3 red lighted triangle

content.detailedDescription: I was in mexico,in a small village in 1963. my mom and i were outside. she was about 30 feet from me,when we saw a lite blue globe about 10 feet from where i was.It came from behind over my right shoulder. it moved from my right to left as i faced it.I was about 10 to 15 ft high,and moved slow,like a floating bubble.No noise,at all.It was about 4 or 5 ft in diameter.It kept moving until it went into the trees and it disappeared.I was 13 years old,but was not scared,because it was not scary to me,just very odd,at the time.I did not know my mom was behind me,until i turned and saw her.Where were both trying to figure what we both saw.I know may people have seen ufo sighting,but i have always wanted to know, if anyone ever had the same type of sighting we experienced.Every time i share my experience, it's like i saw it yesterday. hope i get some feed back on this.
content.summary: It was after sundown,the place was a small village, with no electricity yet installed there.
